summary:
Change the appearance of the vampire lord.
Keep the face of the character of the original.
Vampire royal armor and wings. Require Dawnguard.
(v1.1) Require SKSE & SkyUI & XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS.
After transformation, and wait to lower the arm. You can equip clothes and armor from the inventory. (Hold Shift in SkyUI)
descriptionHtml:
Change the appearance of the vampire lord.
Keep the face of the character of the original.
Vampire royal armor and Wings.

Require Dawnguard.

(v1.1) Require SKSE & SkyUI & XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS.
After transformation, and wait to lower the arm. You can equip clothes and armor from the inventory. (Hold Shift in SkyUI)
If Elf, Khajiit, Argonian, you will unnatural that it is equipped with a view of the skin.
If your race is Argonian or Khajiit, have tail.
If your race is Argonian or Khajiit or Elf, have its hands & feet.


(v1.0) If you use Vampier royal armor for BBP, female transformation is happen CTD.
Please Edit skeleton_femaleVLIA.nif by Nifskope.
Transplant Breast and Butt from BBP skeleton.

This mod has conflict with other mods that edit vampire lord races.
Use TES5Edit If you use along with the MOD of vampire lord races.

Do not expect updates, support.
I can not use English well.
author: oldc

files.name: Vampire Lord Immersive Appearance - require XPMS
